8.パーティに 空きがありません。|入れ替える人を 選択してください。|<break: There is no room in your party.|Please select someone to be replaced.|<break>

10.<%sM_snpc2>と別れ|<%sM_snpc>が 仲間に加わった！: You've parted ways with <%sM_snpc2>|and <%sM_snpc> joined the party!

11.<color_yellow>フウキの仲間の スキルについての説明です！|<br>:
This is an explanation of the skills of Fuki|Friends! You can assign skill points and|change additional skills to Fuki Friends by|
|using the "Fuki Friends" command in the|"Misc." section. The "Skill Allocation"|command allows you to allocate skill points in|
|the same way as you. The "Change Additional|Skills" command allows you to select up to|two skills in addition to the three you|
|already have. Choose your own skills to power|up your friends!|
